frontmatter.title: A redesign of the Kien app made it possible to have more overview and control over the flexible Kien speakers
frontmatter.intro: Kien is a sound system that can adapt to every situation. The speakers can be used as a stereo, multi-room, surround sound or portable music system. The accompanying Kien app currently supports users mainly in configuring the speakers. Sound and network settings of the speakers can also be adjusted through the app. but users experience problems in using the app.
